title: Authors and Citation
text: Raymond B, Ickowicz , Widdison T (2025). fivbvis: Client FIVB VIS Web Service https://www.fivb.org/VisSDK/VisWebService/. R package version 0.0.7, https://github.com/openvolley/fivbvis, https://fivbvis.openvolley.org.
code: @Manual{,   title = {fivbvis: Client for the FIVB VIS Web Service \url{https://www.fivb.org/VisSDK/VisWebService/}},   author = {Ben Raymond and Adrien Ickowicz and Tyler Widdison},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.7, https://github.com/openvolley/fivbvis},   url = {https://fivbvis.openvolley.org}, }

what: Client for the FIVB VIS Web Service \url{https://www.fivb.org/VisSDK/VisWebService/}
title: Client for the FIVB VIS Web Service \url{https://www.fivb.org/VisSDK/VisWebService/}
text: fivbvis provides R client FIVB VIS web service system.

title: Client for the FIVB VIS Web Service \url{https://www.fivb.org/VisSDK/VisWebService/}
code: options(repos = c(openvolley = "https://openvolley.r-universe.dev",                   CRAN = "https://cloud.r-project.org"))  install.packages("fivbvis")  ## or  install.packages("remotes") ## if needed remotes::install_github("openvolley/fivbvis")

title: Client for the FIVB VIS Web Service \url{https://www.fivb.org/VisSDK/VisWebService/}
text: Fetch list tournaments: Get details specific tournament: default, results cached per-session cache, make request local results used, rather re-downloading:
code: library(fivbvis) all_tournaments <- v_get_volley_tournament_list() nrow(all_tournaments) #> [1] 1062 v_get_volley_tournament(1) #> # A tibble: 1 × 56 #>   Actions BuyTicketsUrl City ContainsMatches ContainsMatchResults ContainsNews #>                <int>           <int>                <int>        <int> #> 1                  0               0                    0            0 #>   ContainsPictures ContainsPlayByPlay ContainsPlayers ContainsRanking #>              <int>              <int>           <int>           <int> #> 1                0                  0               0 0              0                     0 #>   CountryCode CountryName DeadlineO2 DeadlineO2A DeadlineO2bis #>   <chr>       <chr>       <date>     <lgl>       <date>        #> 1 DZ          Algeria     2005-05-20 NA          2005-08-22    #>   DefaultPlayersRanking EndDate    EventLogos Gender IsFreeEntrance IsVisManaged #>   <lgl>                 <date>     <lgl>       <int>          <int>        <int> #> 1 NA                    2005-09-01 NA              0              0            0 #>   Logos MaxNbPlayersO2 MaxNbPlayersO2A MaxNbPlayersO2bis #>   <lgl>          <int>           <int>             <int> #> 1 NA                18               0                12 #>   MaxNbTeamOfficialsOnBench MaxNbTeams Name                                    #>                       <int>      <int> <chr> <date>      <int>    <int> #> 1 Youth Boys' U19 World Championship 2005 2005-08-24      4        1 #>   TournamentLogos  Type WebSite Version #>   <lgl>           <int> <lgl>     <int> #> 1 NA title: Client for the FIVB VIS Web Service \url{https://www.fivb.org/VisSDK/VisWebService/}
Client for the FIVB VIS Web Service \url{https://www.fivb.org/VisSDK/VisWebService/}
text: indicates XML response FIVB server large deeply nested causing parser fail. default parser restricts nesting level allows, order prevent crashes undesirable behaviour. can remove restriction : try request .

title: fivbvis — fivbvis
fivbvis — fivbvis
text: Maintainer: Ben Raymond ben@untan.gl Authors: Adrien Ickowicz Tyler Widdison contributors: openvolley.org [originator]

what: Get or set fivbvis caching behaviour — v_caching
title: Get or set fivbvis caching behaviour — v_caching
text: default, fivbvis starts session-specific caching (equivalent running v_caching(TRUE); v_cache_dir("session")).

title: Get or set fivbvis caching behaviour — v_caching
Get or set fivbvis caching behaviour — v_caching
text: caching logical string: TRUE, used cached results; FALSE, caching; "refresh", refresh cache cache_dir string: either "session" - use session-specific directory caching, meaning R closed restarted, cache cleared new one used "user" - use persistent, user-specific directory (returned user_data_dir string giving path specific directory use. directory must already exist

title: Get or set fivbvis caching behaviour — v_caching
text: caching setting (v_caching) cache directory (v_cache_dir) applying provided parameters

title: Get or set fivbvis caching behaviour — v_caching
code: v_caching(TRUE) ## turn caching on v_caching(FALSE) ## turn caching off v_caching("refresh") ## contents in cache will be updated  v_cache_dir() ## return current cache dir #> [1] "/tmp/RtmpAyGiis/file1f05685fd416d4" if (FALSE) {   v_cache_dir("session") ## use per-session cache   v_cache_dir("user") ## use persistent, user-specific cache   v_cache_dir("c:/my/cache/dir") ## use specific dir }

title: Request to get a beach volleyball Olympic Selection ranking — v_get_beach_olympic_selection_ranking
code: v_get_beach_olympic_selection_ranking(   gender,   gamesyear,   onlyselected,   referencedate,   fields = v_fields("Beach Olympic Selection Ranking") )

title: Request to get a beach volleyball Olympic Selection ranking — v_get_beach_olympic_selection_ranking
text: gender character: gender olympic ranking selection gamesyear integer: year return ranking selection. parameter specified, web service return ranking latest olympic games ranking. onlyselected logical: selection status returned teams. NULL specified, resulting list contain selected -selected teams. FALSE, resulting list contain non-selected teams. TRUE, resulting list contain selected teams referencedate Date: reference date ranking: ranking calculated. Olympic Games selection ranking calculated specified date, returned ranking empty. parameter specified, web service return ranking latest reference date fields character: fields return

title: Set or get fivbvis options — v_options
text: current options (invisibly unless least one parameter provided)
